chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Axel R. Conrad was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault), a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Provide DNA sample, unless already provided.  Undergo any counseling/treatment per agent.  No contact w/victim or victims family w/o agents permission. No sexual/romantic relationships with any persons under the age of 18.  Sex Offender Treatment and Sex Offender Registry under 301.45(2m).  Not to possess controlled substances w/o valid prescription.  Absolute Sobriety of controlled substances and alcohol.

If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Axel R. Conrad in court with attorney Mark W. Frank.  Defendant Axel R. Conrad in custody. Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Both parties have recv'd and reviewed PSI.  Chapter 950 complied with.  Atty. Frank doesn't have any substantial corrections of PSI.  State concurs with agent's recommendation.  Atty. Frank joins in recommendation of agent.  DE does collaque.  Court withholds sentence.

Count 1:
5 years Probation
DNA surcharge/sample, unless already provided
No relationships other than casual acquaints under the age of 18
Undergo any counseling per agent
AODA & treatment
No contact w/victim or victims family w/o agents permission
Sex Offender Treatment and Comply with Registry under 301.45(2m)
Absolute Sobriety of drugs and alcohol
No controlled substances w/o a valid prescription
$518.00 C/C  & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)
Paperwork handed in court.

Defendant Axel R. Conrad in court with attorney Mark W. Frank.  Defendant Axel R. Conrad in custody.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states agreement/PSI requested w/argued sentencing to be set.  Atty Frank agrees and enters NC pleas to agreed charges.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on pleas.  DE advised of felony firearms warnings/voting rights.  Court accepts pleas/finds DE guilty.  State suggests 8 weeks for PSI per request from DOC.  Court orders PSI be completed by 8/17/2015 and matters set for argued sentencing.  Bonds continued.

15CF56
Ct 1:  NC

15CF54
Ct 1:  Dismissed
Cts 2 and 3:  NC
Ct 4:  Dismissed  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 28, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Axel R. Conrad in court with attorney Mark W. Frank.  Defendant Axel R. Conrad in custody.  Kevin Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states recs.   Atty Frank agrees and then makes statement on DE's behalf.  DE makes statement on his own behalf.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.

13CM360
9 months jail w/huber concurrent to 14CF56 w/huber privileges consecutive to any other sentence to commence FORTHWITH
Unpaid costs/surcharges to be taken from huber account and then converted to civil judgment upon release
100 days credit to be applied


14CF56
3 months jail concurrent to 13CM360 sentence w/huber privileges but consecutive to any other sentence
Unpaid costs/surcharges to be taken from huber account and then converted to civil judgment upon release
17 days credt to be applied


15CF54 and 15CF56...Atty Calkins states he will speak to the judicial assistant about having those set out for further dates.  Bond continues in both matters.

Defendant Axel R. Conrad in court with attorney Mark W. Frank.  Defendant Axel R. Conrad in custody.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial br. 1.  Bond continues.

Defendant Axel R. Conrad in court with attorney Mark W. Frank.  Defendant Axel R. Conrad in custody.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 1.

Pre-trial conference on February 13, 2015 at 08:45 am.
Return date on February 24, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Axel R. Conrad appeared by video means with Attorney Middleton. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has not yet applied.  State gives criminal history.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State request $2500.00 cash bond with conditions.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Attorney Middleton request $500.00 cash bond.  Currently on a hold.  Time limits waived.  $2500.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact with victim, K.A.J. dob 3/7/1999 and no contact with any females under age 18 years.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 13, 2015 at 08:45 am.  Return date scheduled for February 24, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
